description.narrative: This activity (Humanitarian Technical Support in Africa) is a component of Africa Humanitarian Response Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,123,825. This component benefits Africa, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Relief co-ordination and support services. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 29-11-2018 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
